Greencare Interior Plants Website Skeleton Setup

The new greencaretx.com website has a responsive site structure

31 March 2015

We are in the process of redesigning the Greencare Interior Plants website - www.greencaretx.com. Like all of our projects, this website is mobile-optimized. The clip below simulates how the website appears on progressively smaller screens. It also displays the mobile-optimized navigation menu at the end.
